name: Po(n)g
description:
Hello,

This is a small pong game I made to re-remember Unity after I took a break from it.

Move sideways using the arrow/WASD keys and flip between the top and bottom of the screen using the spacebar.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!

I hope you enjoy :)

P.S. Your speakers work fine, I just didn't have time to add audio and really wanted to upload.
